getValues().description: Returns the full list of unique values used by the Set Filter.

setMiniFilter(text).description: Sets the text in the Mini Filter at the top of the filter (the 'quick search' in the popup).

refreshFilterValues().description: Refreshes the values shown in the filter from the original source. For example, if a callback was provided, the callback will be executed again and the filter will refresh using the values returned.

setFilterValues(values[]).description: Sets the values used in the Set Filter on the fly.

resetFilterValues().description: Resets the Set Filter to use values from the grid, rather than any values that have been provided directly.
